column1: # The observer, T.Booth, recorded rainfall at Castle Cottage, Stamford, and then at St Martin's, Stamford.
# The directions shown on the 1880s rainfall sheet indicate the move to St Martin's happened by 1887, although
# British Rainfall lists Booth at Castle Cottage until 1892, and at St Martin's from 1894 onwards.
# So there is some doubt about when the move happened. This file assumes the move was at the start of 1887.
# Castle Cottage seems to be located on Sheep Market in Stamford.
